marklogic.body:
Kathy never did anything near as nasty as Colton did.Â She complained about the need to build a fire and get a shelter built, but of course she was also there to help anyone in need.Â Urinating on John's toe after he stepped on a Sea Urchin scored her points with everyone who saw she was a team player.Â I'm sure Colton was willing to piss on anyone in the game, but he wouldn't need a Sea Urchin to do it.
You're right about Jonas crying over Colton's injury.Â He had a soft Spot for Colton.Â But his tears were inspired by Colton's removal from the game, not a personality change.Â Jonas' Jury vote would entirely Depend on who was sitting next to Colton.
